info.title: pollinations.ai API
info.description:
Documentation for `gen.pollinations.ai` - the pollinations.ai API gateway.

[üìù Edit docs](https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations/edit/master/enter.pollinations.ai/src/routes/docs.ts)

## Quick Start

Get your API key at https://enter.pollinations.ai

### Image Generation
```bash
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/image/a%20cat?model=flux' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'
```

### Text Generation
```bash
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/v1/chat/completions' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"model": "openai", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}]}'
```

### Vision (Image Input)
```bash
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/v1/chat/completions' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"model": "openai", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Describe this image"}, {"type": "image_url", "image_url": {"url": "https://example.com/image.jpg"}}]}]}'
```

**Gemini Tools:** `gemini`, `gemini-large` have `code_execution` enabled (can generate images/plots). `gemini-search` has `google_search` enabled. Responses may include `content_blocks` with `image_url`, `text`, or `thinking` types.

### Simple Text Endpoint
```bash
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/text/hello?key=YOUR_API_KEY'
```

### Streaming
```bash
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/v1/chat/completions' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"model": "openai", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Write a poem"}], "stream": true}' \
  --no-buffer
```

### Model Discovery
**Always check available models before testing:**

- **Image models:** [/image/models](https://gen.pollinations.ai/image/models)
- **Text models:** [/v1/models](https://gen.pollinations.ai/v1/models)

## Authentication

**Two key types (both consume Pollen from your balance):**
- **Publishable Keys (`pk_`):** ‚ö†Ô∏è **Beta - not yet ready for production use.** For client-side apps, IP rate-limited (1 pollen per IP per hour). **Warning:** Exposing in public code will consume your Pollen if your app gets traffic.
- **Secret Keys (`sk_`):** Server-side only, no rate limits. Keep secret - never expose publicly.

**Auth methods:**
1. Header: `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`
2. Query param: `?key=YOUR_API_KEY`

## Account Management

Check your balance and usage:

```bash
# Check pollen balance
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/account/balance' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'

# Get profile info
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/account/profile' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'

# View usage history
curl 'https://gen.pollinations.ai/account/usage' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'
```

tags.name: gen.pollinations.ai
tags.description: Generate text, images, and videos using AI models

tags.name: Bring Your Own Pollen üå∏
tags.description:
# Bring Your Own Pollen (BYOP) üå∏

Users pay for their own AI usage. You pay $0. Ship apps without API costs.

## The Flow

1. User taps "Connect with Pollinations"
2. They sign in ‚Üí get a temp API key
3. Their pollen, your app

## Why BYOP?

- **$0 costs** ‚Äî 1 user or 1000, same price: free
- **No key drama** ‚Äî auth flow handles it
- **Self-regulating** ‚Äî everyone pays for their own usage
- **Frontend only** ‚Äî no backend needed

![Authorize Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pollinations/pollinations/main/enter.pollinations.ai/public/authorize-screen.png)

## URLs

Say your app is at `https://myapp.com`

**Auth link:**
```
https://enter.pollinations.ai/authorize?redirect_url=https://myapp.com
```

**With preselected options:**
```
https://enter.pollinations.ai/authorize?redirect_url=https://myapp.com&permissions=profile,balance&models=flux,openai&expiry=7&budget=10
```

| Param | Description | Example |
|-------|-------------|---------|
| `models` | Allowed models (comma-separated) | `flux,openai,gptimage` |
| `budget` | Pollen budget limit | `10` |
| `expiry` | Key expiry in days (default: 30) | `7` |
| `permissions` | Account permissions | `profile,balance,usage` |

**Redirect back:**
```
https://myapp.com#api_key=sk_abc123xyz
```

> Key is in the `#` fragment ‚Äî never hits server logs üîí

## Code

```javascript
// 1. Send user to auth
window.location.href = `https://enter.pollinations.ai/authorize?redirect_url=${encodeURIComponent(location.href)}`;

// 2. Grab key from URL after redirect
const apiKey = new URLSearchParams(location.hash.slice(1)).get('api_key');

// 3. Use their pollen
fetch('https://gen.pollinations.ai/v1/chat/completions', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${apiKey}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
  body: JSON.stringify({ model: 'openai', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'yo' }] })
});
```

Keys expire in 30 days ¬∑ revoke anytime from dashboard

---

[üìù Edit this doc](https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations/edit/main/BRING_YOUR_OWN_POLLEN.md) ¬∑ *h/t [Puter.js](https://docs.puter.com/user-pays-model/) for pioneering this*

get.description: Get user profile info (name, email, GitHub username, tier, createdAt, nextResetAt). Requires `account:profile` permission for API keys.

200.description: User profile with name, email, githubUsername, tier, createdAt, nextResetAt

403.description: Permission denied - API key missing `account:profile` permission

get.description: Get pollen balance. Returns the key's remaining budget if set, otherwise the user's total balance. Requires `account:balance` permission for API keys.

balance.description: Remaining pollen balance (combines tier, pack, and crypto balances)

403.description: Permission denied - API key missing `account:balance` permission

get.description: Get request history and spending data. Supports JSON and CSV formats. Requires `account:usage` permission for API keys.

200.description: Usage records with timestamp, model, tokens, cost_usd, etc.

output_reasoning_tokens.description: Number of reasoning tokens (for models with chain-of-thought)

output_image_tokens.description: Number of output image tokens (1 per image)

cost_usd.description: Cost in USD for this request

403.description: Permission denied - API key missing `account:usage` permission

get.description: Get daily aggregated usage data (last 90 days). Supports JSON and CSV formats. Requires `account:usage` permission for API keys. Results are cached for 1 hour.

200.description: Daily usage records aggregated by date/model

403.description: Permission denied - API key missing `account:usage` permission

get.description: Get API key status and information. Returns key validity, type, expiry, permissions, and remaining budget. This endpoint allows validating keys without making expensive generation requests. Requires API key authentication.

valid.description: Whether the API key is valid and active

name.description: Display name of the API key

expiresAt.description: Expiry timestamp in ISO 8601 format, null if never expires

expiresIn.description: Seconds until expiry, null if never expires

models.description: List of allowed model IDs, null = all models allowed

account.description: List of account permissions, null = no account access

pollenBudget.description: Remaining pollen budget for this key, null = unlimited (uses user balance)

rateLimitEnabled.description: Whether rate limiting is enabled for this key

get.description: Get available text models (OpenAI-compatible). If an API key with model restrictions is provided, only allowed models are returned.

500.description: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

anyOf.const: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

get.description: Get a list of available image generation models with pricing, capabilities, and metadata. If an API key with model restrictions is provided, only allowed models are returned.

anyOf.const: pollen

schema.description: List of models with pricing and metadata

500.description: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

anyOf.const: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

post.description:
OpenAI-compatible chat completions endpoint.

**Legacy endpoint:** `/openai` (deprecated, use `/v1/chat/completions` instead)

**Authentication (Secret Keys Only):**

Include your API key in the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token:

`Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`

API keys can be created from your dashboard at enter.pollinations.ai.
Both key types consume Pollen. Secret keys have no rate limits.

400.description: Something was wrong with the input data, check the details for more info.

anyOf.const: Something was wrong with the input data, check the details for more info.

anyOf.const: Authentication required. Please provide an API key via Authorization header (Bearer token) or ?key= query parameter.

model.description: AI model for text generation. See /v1/models for full list.

get.description:
Generates text from text prompts.

**Authentication:**

Include your API key either:
- In the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token: `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`
- As a query parameter: `?key=YOUR_API_KEY`

API keys can be created from your dashboard at enter.pollinations.ai.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Text prompt for generation

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Text model to use for generation

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducible results. Use -1 for random.

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: System prompt to set context/behavior for the model

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Return response in JSON format

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Controls creativity (0.0=strict, 2.0=creative)

parameters.name: stream
parameters.description: Stream response in real-time chunks

get.description:
Generate an image or video from a text prompt.

**Image Models:** `flux` (default), `turbo`, `gptimage`, `kontext`, `seedream`, `nanobanana`, `nanobanana-pro`

**Video Models:** `veo`, `seedance`
- `veo`: Text-to-video only (4-8 seconds)
- `seedance`: Text-to-video and image-to-video (2-10 seconds)

**Authentication:**

Include your API key either:
- In the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token: `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`
- As a query parameter: `?key=YOUR_API_KEY`

API keys can be created from your dashboard at enter.pollinations.ai.

200.description: Success - Returns the generated image or video

400.description: Something was wrong with the input data, check the details for more info.

anyOf.const: Something was wrong with the input data, check the details for more info.

401.description: Authentication required. Please provide an API key via Authorization header (Bearer token) or ?key= query parameter.

anyOf.const: Authentication required. Please provide an API key via Authorization header (Bearer token) or ?key= query parameter.

402.description: Insufficient pollen balance or API key budget exhausted.

anyOf.const: Insufficient pollen balance or API key budget exhausted.

403.description: Access denied! You don't have the required permissions for this resource or model.

anyOf.const: Access denied! You don't have the required permissions for this resource or model.

500.description: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

anyOf.const: Oh snap, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Text description of the image or video to generate

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: AI model. Image: flux, zimage, turbo, gptimage, kontext, seedream, seedream-pro, nanobanana. Video: veo, seedance, seedance-pro

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Image width in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Image height in pixels

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducible results. Use -1 for random.

parameters.name: enhance
parameters.description: Let AI improve your prompt for better results

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description: What to avoid in the generated image

parameters.name: safe
parameters.description: Enable safety content filters

parameters.name: quality
parameters.description: Image quality level (gptimage only)

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Reference image URL(s). Comma/pipe separated for multiple. For veo: image[0]=first frame, image[1]=last frame (interpolation)

parameters.name: transparent
parameters.description: Generate with transparent background (gptimage only)

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Video duration in seconds (video models only). veo: 4, 6, or 8. seedance: 2-10

parameters.name: aspectRatio
parameters.description: Video aspect ratio: 16:9 or 9:16 (veo, seedance)

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: Enable audio generation for video (veo only)
